title: Elegant Shenzhen Yantian Escape near Dameisha Beach with Three Restaurants & Swimming Pool
description:
Experience the vibrant charm of Yantian, one of the nine districts of Shenzhen, with a stay at this ideally located Hyatt Regency outpost. With the scenic Dameisha and Xiaomeisha beaches nearby, you’ll enjoy easy access to everything, from waterfront strolls to cultural adventures.

After a day of exploring, unwind with exceptional dining options: Market Café, set on the 30th floor, serves seasonal international cuisine in an open kitchen setting, while XIANGYUE offers authentic Cantonese flavours. Whether you're enjoying city views over dinner or relaxing with a cocktail in the Regency Club, the hotel offers the perfect blend of style, comfort and local flair.

title: Modern Shenzhen Hyatt Luxury in the Heart of Luohu with Rooftop Pool and Eight Restaurants & Bars
description:
Discover the vibrant city of Shenzhen from the heart of the luxurious Luohu district. This ultra-modern hotel, positioned on the 24th to 36th floors of the prestigious City Crossing Shopping Centre, offers breathtaking views of the city's skyline. Experience the finest Cantonese cuisine at China Lodge or indulge in a variety of international dishes at The Show Kitchen.

Explore the city's cultural and entertainment highlights, including the Shenzhen Museum, the KK100 skyscraper and the picturesque Lianhuashan Park. After a day of sightseeing, retreat to the hotel's indoor heated pool or rejuvenate at the state-of-the-art fitness centre. This hotel is the perfect base for your Shenzhen adventure.

title: China Shenzhen Cosmopolitan Cool with Three Restaurants
description: Take a deep dive into the buzz of megacity Shenzhen, yours to explore from your base at Crowne Plaza Shenzhen Nanshan, an IHG Hotel. Swim laps in the indoor swimming pool, which boasts panoramas across the city from expansive windows, and work up an appetite for the three exceptional dining venues. Savour fresh pastries and coffee at Craft, try a new twist on traditional Cantonese cuisine at Palcate Chinese Restaurant, and load your plate at the buffet at Yun All Day Dining Restaurant.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Shenzhen Nanshan, an IHG Hotel

title: Stylish Shenzhen City Break near Metro Station & Dongmen Shopping District
description:
Find your rhythm in the heart of Shenzhen’s Dongmen district, where this contemporary urban escape places you amid the city’s buzzing shopping streets and rich street food culture. Just steps from LaoJie Metro Station, this sleek urban retreat invites you to unwind in spacious rooms with city views, plush bedding and thoughtful touches designed for effortless comfort.

Fuel your adventures with a generous breakfast, stay on track at the 24-hour gym, or relax in the lounge between city explorations. Get front-row access to the lively and iconic Dongmen Pedestrian Street, teeming with boutiques, sizzling street food and local charm. Whether you’re travelling for work or play, this sleek sanctuary is your stylish base for discovering Shenzhen’s dynamic spirit.
offer_address: 3018 Jianshe Road, Luohu District, Shenzhen, Guangdong, 518040, China

title: Stylish China Shenzhen City Break with Children's Wonderland
description: Discover the best of the Pearl River Delta metropolis with a stay at Crowne Plaza Shenzhen Longgang City Centre, an IHG Hotel, positioned at the heart of one of China’s most exciting developments. This is the perfect family-friendly escape - spend fun-filled days at children’s paradise Ding-Dong Land and evenings dining across five venues, including high-end grill Teppanyaki and authentic dim sum palace Fortuna Chinese Restaurant.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Shenzhen Longgang City Centre, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 9009 Longxiang Avenue, Longgang City Centre, Longgang District, Shenzhen 518172, China

title: Sophisticated Shenzhen Escape on Flowing Riverbank
description: Explore China’s vibrant megacity, bursting with a free-spirited ambience when you stay at the sleek Crowne Plaza Shenzhen WECC, an IHG Hotel. Uncover a refreshing, forward-thinking city that celebrates multicultural flavours, arts and nightlife, while embracing its ancestry. Enjoy days exploring, eating and shopping your way through this metropolis before returning to minimalistic bliss at this stylish hotel, with swimming and wholesome dining at your fingertips.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Shenzhen WECC, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Zhanyun Road, Baoan District, Shenzhen 518100, China

vendor_name: Hotel Indigo Shenzhen Overseas Chinese Town
title: China: Shenzhen Venetian-Style Stay near Window of the World Theme Park
description: Boasting Venetian-style design and views of the Window of the World, the Hotel Indigo Shenzhen Overseas Chinese Town, an IHG Hotel, is your ticket to a whirlwind tour of global monuments. Only steps from replicas of the Eiffel Tower, the Great Pyramid of Giza and the Taj Mahal, you'll be snapping scenic selfies in no time. Immerse yourself in art and music at OCT Loft Creative Culture Park before returning for a smooth scotch at Campiello 26 bar and dining on seafood at Marco's.
location_description: Hotel Indigo Shenzhen Overseas Chinese Town, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 9026 Shennan Road, Nanshan District, Shenzhen, Guangdong 518000, China

title: Modern Shenzhen Airport Stay with Indoor Pool & Three Onsite Restaurants
description:
Make your layover the destination at this world-class airport hotel, perfectly positioned at the base of Shenzhen Airport. Unwind in the hotel's state-of-the-art fitness centre, savour international cuisine across three restaurants, take a refreshing dip in the indoor pool, or enjoy a revitalising treatment at the onsite spa. 

With the bustling city of Shenzhen on your doorstep, you're ideally located to discover the vibrant shopping districts, heritage sites and cultural landmarks. For those seeking a taste of local culture, the nearby Splendid China Folk Village and Window of the World theme park offer unique experiences for the whole family.
offer_address: Shenzhen Bao'an International Airport, Shenzhen 518128, China

title: Shenzhen Airport Hotel 30 Minutes from CBD with Onsite Dining & Indoor Pool
description:
Lounge in complete style with a stay at Hyatt House Shenzhen Airport, a modern retreat ideally positioned with direct access to the arrival hall. Perfect for a seamless layover, or as your convenient Shenzhen base, the hotel is just 30 minutes from the city's centre.

For those seeking relaxation, the hotel boasts a state-of-the-art fitness centre, an indoor pool and a selection of dining options to suit every palate. Start your day with breakfast at Omelet Bar, unwind with mouthwtering bites and creative cocktails at H Bar, and grab a snack or essential groceries from the 24-hour H Market.

title: China Shenzhen Urban Luxury with Brew House & Authentic Italian Restaurant
description: The thriving metropolis of Shenzhen is alive with the buzz of great dining, music and nightlife - be part of the scene when you stay at Crowne Plaza Hotel & Suites Landmark Shenzhen, an IHG Hotel. During your stay, savour mouthwatering dishes at four dining venues: feast on Cantonese fare at Fortune Court, sip beers and taste international favourites at Brew House, twirl pasta at Prego Italian Restaurant and order a cocktail or two at Vienna lounge. Cap off your stay with a dip in the pool.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Hotel & Suites Landmark Shenzhen, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 3018 Nanhu Road, Luohu District, Shenzhen 518001, China

title: Five-Star Shenzhen Beachfront Oasis with Ocean-Facing Infinity Pool
description: Stroll along the beach beneath swaying palm trees when you stay at InterContinental Shenzhen Dameisha Resort, an IHG Hotel, a five-star beachfront oasis. This is the perfect spot to flop and drop, with five swimming pools (including an ocean-facing infinity pool and a children's swimming pool complete with waterslides). When it's time for dinner or a sunset tipple, choose from any of the three restaurants and bars - don't miss a French-inspired meal at The Azure, just moments from the beach.
location_description: InterContinental Shenzhen Dameisha Resort, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: No. 9 Yankui Road, Dameisha Yantian District, Shenzhen, 518083, Mainland China

title: Modern CBD Stay in Shenzhen with Onsite Pool, Dining & Bar
description:
In the heart of Shenzhen's bustling business district, find a sanctuary of tranquillity and comfort, perfectly positioned for exploring the city's vibrant culture and cuisine. Venture to the nearby Dongmen Pedestrian Street, a bustling hub of shopping and street food, explore the historic architecture of Chiwan Tin Hau Temple, or enjoy a day out at Happy Valley and Window of the World.

After a day of discovery, retreat to the hotel's Square Restaurant for a tantalising array of international and Asian dishes. Alternatively, enjoy a refreshing drink at the contemporary bar. For moments of relaxation, the hotel's fitness centre and outdoor pool provide the perfect respite amidst the city's energetic rhythm.
offer_address: 1019 Shennan Middle Road, Futian District, Shenzhen, Guangdong Province 518031, China

title: Shenzhen Airport Hyatt Escape 30 Minutes from CBD with Onsite Dining, Fitness Centre & Indoor Pool
description:
Located just steps from Shenzhen Bao'an International Airport, this contemporary hotel offers a seamless blend of comfort and convenience. Each of the hotel's spacious rooms features plush bedding, modern amenities and a tranquil atmosphere, perfect for a restful night's sleep after a long flight.

Should you wish to explore, you'll be within easy reach of Shenzhen, a vibrant city known for its bustling tech scene and thriving cultural attractions. Back at the hotel, indulge in a leisurely swim in the indoor pool, maintain a fitness routine at the state-of-the-art gym, or grab a bite to eat at the 24-hour restaurant.
offer_address: 3/F, Gate 14, Terminal 3, Shenzhen Bao'an International Airport, Shenzhen, 518128, China

title: Stylish China Escape in Shenzhen Bay with Onsite Restaurants, Bars & Indoor Pool
description:
Nestled among tech giants and towering skyscrapers, Andaz Shenzhen Bay is your private clubhouse in the heart of innovation. Kick back in design-forward rooms where floor-to-ceiling windows frame stunning views of Shenzhen Park and Mangrove Nature Reserve, while you recharge and soak in the bay's golden hour.

When hunger strikes, take your pick from five dining and drinking hotspots that will take you around the world in a single mouthful, then check out the indoor pool overlooking the vast cityscape. Afterwards, head out to feel Shenzhen's pulse - stroll through Shenzhen Bay Park, shop at Luohu Commercial City or visit the Shenzhen Museum.
offer_address: 2600 Keyuan South Road, Nanshan District, Shenzhen 518052, China
